PICOs.Population: Patients with lung cancer (ICD - 10: C34) and pleural mesothelioma (ICD - 10: C45)
PICOs.Outcomes: Progression-free survival (PFS), Overall response rate (ORR), Quality of life (QoL)

PICOs.Comparator: Standard of care (chemotherapy, EGFR inhibitors, ALK inhibitors)
PICOs.Outcomes: Efficacy and safety outcomes, Quality of life (QoL)
